nodes.text: Randorn 2 was the second planet in the Randorn system of the Belderone sector. It was home to the primitive Mizx sentient species along with non-sentient layalls, hecxts and ibliton. The ibliton were the dominant predator of the planet's swamps and, along with eating fish and small rodent, it attacked Mizx villages. The Mizx developed myths in which the ibliton originated from the demented soul of Hershoon the Destroyer.
